Reviews: I brought this boat wireless headphones multiple times. The headphones are fantastic and worth the money. Here are some of the pros and cons of these headphones:Pros:The sound quality is amazingLong battery backupcompatible with all Bluetooth devices.Can connect two devices simultaneously.Multidevice connecting featureNoise cancellation is amazing.Fast charging takes almost half an hour to charge the battery fully.Last but not least water resistant.Cons:Can cause ear pain in long-time continuous use.Come out from the ear while running or exercising.Sometimes disconnects automatically and again connects automatically.So those were the pros and cons of these boats' Bluetooth earphones. I have been using these earphones for a long time. That was my review, and I hope you will find it helpful. Don't forget to follow for other product reviews.

Overall an excellent product at this price. What i love about it is the dual paring which stays connected to 2 device at the same time. I earlier used apple airpods which automatically switches to device as per need. After using this neckband i am really not missing airpods as this also switches automatically. One star less as the ear buds are little uncomfortable on prolonged use.

I bought this in March 2023. It has already conked off. Agreed, there is a warranty, but to claim it, I have to pay 1000 rupees to an uber guy and apply a day leave from work. Is it practical? Not at all. I might as well buy an unbranded headphone for 300 that lasts 3 months. Useless product. Don't even buy it.Edit: I wanted to add more to the above feedback. I was upset with this product and went to the twitter page of Boat and made a complaint. I got a response asking me to raise a request on their site. After doing so, they arranged a pick up of the product from my home, got it checked, confirmed that the product is defective and sent me a replacement, which I received today. So, that's my feedback. Their warranty claim process is good. So yes. I may consider buying another Boat in future because of this.

the product is great, the reason i gave a 4star is for its connectivity issues. it connects any of the random Bluetooth device or any strange device in the crowded areas. Anybody can connect device to this neckband if its already connected to your phone.

The wire length and design itself is inconvenient. I cannot walk around freely without those two loops of wire constantly touching/hitting my face.The controller box could be moved to the right end of the neckband. That would be nice I guess but hey I'm just talking a customer experience so idk what you guys had in mind... Though I have seen other neckband earphones with that design and they are lighter which brings my next problem with the earphones‚Äî it's too heavy on my ears and overall.On the good point, In the sound quality, never have BOAT disappointed me so yeah been loving it so far. Battery back is great. Charging is fast.

I'm using this product for 2 days and I have had a great experience with it.With the ENx technology, the Rockerz 255 Neo ensures crystal clear voice calls by effectively canceling out environmental noise.The magnetic sensors inside the buds, automatically detect if they are in use or not. To power them off, simply unite the buds, and to power them on, separate them. This intuitive feature adds convenience to your daily usage.The ASAP Charge technology allows the Rockerz 255 Neo to deliver an impressive 10 hours of playtime with just a 10-minute charge. and With a full charge, these earbuds offer an extended playback time of up to 25 hours.The Rockerz 255 Neo features a low latency BEAST Mode, perfect for gaming enthusiasts. This mode minimizes audio delay.Connectivity is a breeze with the ability to connect the Rockerz 255 Neo to two devices simultaneously using Bluetooth v5.2. Whether you want to switch between your phone and laptop or share audio with a friend.With an IPX6 rating, the Rockerz 255 Neo is designed to withstand sweat and water splashes.Featuring a 12 mm large dynamic driver, these earbuds deliver a powerful bass that transports you to another world of music.The Rockerz 255 Neo provides multiple controls for easy management of calls and music. The multifunction button allows you to answer, hang up, or reject calls, play or pause music, and even wake up your smart assistant. Additionally, dedicated buttons for volume and track control add convenience to your usage.
